irrigationMetrics.label: Applied Irrigation
irrigationMetrics.description: The annual amount of irrigation applied to the field.

irrigationMetrics.label: Annual Relative Irrigation Supply (ARIS)
irrigationMetrics.description: The fraction of water supplied for irrigation from a given reservoir size relative to the total amount of water that would have been used for irrigation if water supply was unlimited. An ARIS value of 1.0 indicates that the reservoir was able to fully meet the annual irrigation requirement.

real.label: Nitrate Load Reduction
real.description: The annual amount of nitrate load that is captured and stored by the reservoir.

real.label: SRP Load Reduction
real.description: The annual amount of reactive phosphorus load that is captured and stored by the reservoir.

percent.label: Nitrate Load Reduction (%)
percent.description: The percent of the annual nitrate load that is captured and stored by the reservoir.

percent.label: SRP Load Reduction (%)
percent.description: The percent of the annual reactive phosphorus load that is captured and stored by the reservoir.

fieldWaterBalance.label: Precipitation
fieldWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of precipitation falling on the field.

fieldWaterBalance.label: Irrigation
fieldWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of irrigation applied to the field.

fieldWaterBalance.label: Upward Flux
fieldWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of upward flux of water into the crop root zone from a shallow water table.

fieldWaterBalance.label: Evapotranspiration
fieldWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of water lost from the field through crop transpiration and evaporation from the surface.

fieldWaterBalance.label: Surface Runoff
fieldWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of water that is lost from the field through surface runoff.

fieldWaterBalance.label: Tile Drain Flow
fieldWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of water that is lost from the field through tile drain flow.

fieldWaterBalance.label: Readily Available Water Threshold
fieldWaterBalance.description: The fraction of total available water that can be used by the crop before crop stress occurs. If Available Soil Water drops below this threshold value crop stress occurs due to too little available water in the soil profile.

fieldWaterBalance.label: Available Soil Water
fieldWaterBalance.description: The average monthly amount of available water in the soil profile.

nutrientCaptureOverflow.label: Overflow Nitrate Load (Tile)
nutrientCaptureOverflow.description: The total monthly amount of nitrate load that overflows from the reservoir due to exceeding the maximum water storage capacity.

nutrientCaptureOverflow.label: Captured Nitrate Load
nutrientCaptureOverflow.description: The total monthly amount of nitrate load that is captured and stored in the reservoir.

nutrientCaptureOverflow.label: Overflow SRP Load
nutrientCaptureOverflow.description: The total monthly amount of reactive phosphorus load that overflows from the reservoir due to exceeding the maximum water storage capacity.

nutrientCaptureOverflow.label: Captured SRP Load
nutrientCaptureOverflow.description: The total monthly amount of reactive phosphorus load that is captured and stored in the reservoir.

nutrientCaptureOverflow.label: Tile Nitrate Load
nutrientCaptureOverflow.description: The total monthly amount of nitrate load that overflows from the reservoir due to exceeding the maximum water storage capacity.

nutrientCaptureOverflow.label: Tile SRP Load
nutrientCaptureOverflow.description: The total monthly reactive phosphorus load in tile drain flow.

reservoirWaterBalance.label: Reservoir Precipitation
reservoirWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of precipitation falling directly on the reservoir.

reservoirWaterBalance.label: Reservoir Drain Flow
reservoirWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of tile drain flow flowing into the reservoir.

reservoirWaterBalance.label: Reservoir Runoff
reservoirWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of surface runoff flowing into the reservoir.

reservoirWaterBalance.label: Irrigation Withdrawl
reservoirWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of water withdrawn from the reservoir for irrigation purposes.

reservoirWaterBalance.label: Seepage
reservoirWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of water lost from the reservoir through seepage.

reservoirWaterBalance.label: Reservoir Evaporation
reservoirWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of water lost from the reservoir through evaporation from water surface.

reservoirWaterBalance.label: Overflow
reservoirWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of water that must overflow from the reservoir due to exceeding the maximum water storage capacity.

reservoirWaterBalance.label: Capture
reservoirWaterBalance.description: The total monthly amount of water that is captured and stored in the reservoir.

reservoirWaterBalance.label: Reservoir Stored Volume
reservoirWaterBalance.description: The average monthly amount of water stored in the reservoir.

reservoirWaterBalance.label: Reservoir Water Depth
reservoirWaterBalance.description: The average monthly depth of water in the reservoir.
